posts.post_content:
For sale here are several PSA 5 T206s.  Scans available (front and back) upon request.  Paypal is OK if funds sent as "gift"; and therefore S&H is free for Net54 members!  First "I'll take it" wins....

Boss Schmidt (portrait) (Piedmont 350) -- $85.00
Admiral Schlei (batting) (Piedmont 350-460) -- $105.00
Bill Dineen (Piedmont 350) -- $100.00
Josh Devore (Piedmont 35-460) -- $85.00
Billy Nattress (Piedment 350) -- $125.00
Rube Geyer (Sweet Cap 350-460) -- $160.00

Thanks!
